title: About Dr. Back - Back to Balance Holistic Family Healthcare Carbondale Colorado - Dr. Hilary Back

sitename: Back to Balance Holistic Family Healthcare Carbondale Colorado - Dr. Hilary Back
cleaned_text: With over 20 years of experience as a naturopathic doctor and acupuncturist, Hilary Back, ND, LAc, practices naturopathic and functional medicine for the whole family with an emphasis on women's health, hormonal issues, thyroid and adrenal disorders, blood sugar issues, gastrointestinal disorders, autoimmune disorders, mood disorders, environmental and food allergens and sensitivities, and pain management. She sees children to older adults. Dr. Back works in conjunction with other doctors of all types (medical, osteopathic, chiropractic, and of course, other naturopathic and functional medicine doctors.) Therefore, if you want multiple approaches, your choices can be accommodated. YOU get to determine what is best for you. EDUCATION & TRAINING National College of Naturopathic Medicine (currently National University of Natural Medicine) Doctor of Naturopathic Medicine, 2000 Masters of Science, Oriental Medicine, 2000 Bucknell University Bachelor of Arts in East Asian Studies and Fine Arts, 1989 Licensure and Registration Doctor of Naturopathic Medicine Colorado, 2014 ND 003 Utah, 2014-2020 ND 9181389-7100 Oregon, Acupuncturist Colorado, ACU 637 We'll send you a coupon for $10 off your next visit when you subscribe! Office hours 10:30 AM to 5 PM, Monday - [Naturopathic Medicine](https://backtobalancedoc.com/index.php/naturopathy/) [Acupuncture](https://backtobalancedoc.com/index.php/acupuncture/) [Request Supplements](https://backtobalancedoc.com/index.php/shop/) [Detox & Cleanse](https://backtobalancedoc.com/index.php/detox/) © 2023. All Rights Reserved. Back to Balance.
